sec.title: 摘要
sec.p: 设d(n)为Dirichlet除数函数。本文考虑了短区间上四元混合幂除数函数的均值问题，并得到了一个有效的渐进公式。

sec.title: On the Sum of Divisors of Mixed Powers of Four Variables in Short Intervals

sec.title: ABSTRACT
sec.p: Let d(n) denote the Dirichlet divisor function. In this paper, we consider the mean value of the mixed power of four variables of the divisor function in short intervals, and obtain an effective asymptotic formula.
Keywords:Divisor Problem, Circle Method, Short Intervals, Mixed Powers of Four Variables

sec.title: 1. 引言与主要结果

∑ 1 ⩽ m 1 , m 2 ⩽ x d ( m 1 2 + m 2 2 ) = A 1 x 2 log x + A 2 x 2 + O ( x 5 / 3 log 9 x ) ,
